Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.question: Hi
Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.answer: Hi! Cómo estás? ¿En qué puedo ayudarte con tus cultivos o agricultura? (How are you? How can I help you with your crops or agriculture?)

Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.question: Nallarukiya
Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.answer:
Enn kanna irukku! (Translation: I see you're not from around here!)

Ninne namma agara vittaip paarkum oru vaarthai. Nallarukiyan ungalukku agara vittaip enakku kittaen. (Translation: I have an agricultural tip for you. You can use this tip for your agriculture.)

Ennakku kittaen, idhuvum pachchai kattu, idhuvum varaiyum pattuvom. (Translation: You must cultivate it and then harvest it.)

Pachchai kattu vitten ennakku varaiyum pattuvom. Senguppathi pattuvaraiyum, idhuvum pataip pottu varaiyum. (Translation: You must grow the crop and then harvest it. For paddy crops, wait till the grain is yellow and the leaves turn brown.)

Kettaip paarkanum, nalla vittaikku sollum. Enakku kittaen, nalla vittaikku sollumeen. (Translation: Don't you know the importance of good cultivation? I'm telling you, only good cultivation gives you good yields.)

Unakku sollum, nalla vittaip pachchai. Ennakku kittaen, nalla vittaip avarai. (Translation: I'm telling you, only good cultivation gives good crops. I'm telling you, only good cultivation gives good harvests.)

Nallarukiyan, enn kanna irukku. Ennakku nalla vittaip sollum. (Translation: Nallarukiyan, I see you're not listening. I'm telling you about good cultivation.)

Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.question: நல்லா இருக்கியா
Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.answer:
நான் நலமாக இருக்கிறேன், நீங்கள் எப்படி இருக்கிறீர்கள்?

வேளாண்மையில் உங்களுக்கு எந்தச் சுயாசனை ஆர்வம் உள்ளது? நான் உங்களுக்கு உதவுவதில் எந்த வகையில் உதவி செய்ய முடியும் என்பதை உங்களுக்குத் தகவல் கூறலாம்.

Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.question: Give intro about Jackie chan
Hallo, hoe kan ik helpen.answer:
You want to know about Jackie Chan na? He's a legendary martial artist, actor, stuntman, and filmmaker from Hong Kong. Born Cheung Chow-hung, which we all know him as Jackie Chan in 1954, he's a global superstar with a career spanning over 5 decades. 

Jackie Chan na's incredible physical stunts have earned him numerous awards and a cult following. In addition to his iconic films like "Rush Hour", "Shanghai Noon", and "Armour of God", he's also known for his impressive philanthropic work. He's been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame and has won the honorary Oscar in 2016 for his contributions to the film industry.

Jackie Chan na's versatility and incredible work ethic make him one of the most beloved and respected individuals in the entertainment industry. Are you a fan of Jackie Chan na?
